example.text: Over $18 billion taxpayer dollars were fraudulently paid out through California’s pandemic unemployment assistance program. Today I voted for the Protecting Taxpayers & Victims of Unemployment Fraud Act to help recover taxpayer dollars lost to fraud. [[url]]

After working closely with House leadership, we were able to secure language in the border security bill to address my concerns on E-Verify & a commitment from leadership to continue working toward solutions. My full statement: [[url]]

During the past year, President Biden has released a record amount of oil from our Strategic Petroleum Reserves (SPR) to foreign countries, with no plan in place to ramp up production to replenish them. Last year, I offered an amendment on the House floor that would prohibit the sale of these reserves to China.

After working closely with House leadership, we were able to secure language in the border security bill to address my concerns on E-Verify & a commitment from leadership to continue working toward solutions. My full statement: [[url]]
